data.name: Where Thoughts Go: Resolutions
data.detailed_description:
What are your new year's resolutions?

Revisit the award-winning world of Where Thoughts Go in an entirely new, free VR experience. Explore the audio New Years Resolutions of countless others who were here before you - and leave yours behind for others to find.

There's a twist, however: the resolutions you record will be sent back to you a year from when you play the experience. What will find, what will you say... and what will your future self think?

Created by award-winning XR Designer Lucas Rizzotto.

data.short_description: Explore the New Years Resolutions of other players - and leave yours behind for others to find. Your resolutions will be e-mailed back to you a year after you submit them. Created by award-winning XR Designer Lucas Rizzotto.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8.1 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 (AMD FX 8350) or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 (AMD Radeon R9 290) or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Microphone Required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Microphone Required
